Course coordinator PHTH 564, Instructor for Critical Care Module in PHTH 564 and is assisting with the foundational cardiorespiratory skills in PHTH 524.";}s:3:"bio";a:1:{s:8:"textarea";s:647:"
  • Amy is the MPT-FV Clinical Education Site lead. In this role, Amy will be supporting both students and clinical educators in the Fraser Valley Region as well as assisting to set up the MPT-FV cohort.
  • Research - NA
